description: Unique identifier for a security role used to group permissions and assign them to users.
Human-readable title of the role shown in administration screens and user-role assignments.
Detailed description of the role’s purpose, scope, and permitted activities to aid administrators.
Boolean flag indicating whether the role was user-defined (custom) versus a system-delivered default.
Timestamp when the role record was first created, for audit and change tracking.
Identifier of the user account that created the role; enables audit linkage to the creating user.
Timestamp of the most recent update to the role’s definition, for audit and change tracking.
Identifier of the user account that last modified the role; supports audit trails.
